== Ubuntu Ireland and Skynet ==
<nowiki>[[File:ubuntuskynet.jpg]]</nowiki>   

The Ubuntu-ie LoCo Community can be seen throughout Ireland. The <nowiki>[[http://www.ul.ie/ |University of Limerick]]</nowiki>(UL) Computer Society, <nowiki>[[http://www.skynet.ie/ |Skynet]]</nowiki> have very kindly offered to host an Ubuntu-ie event. 

On Saturday February 27th, Skynet will host an afternoon of talks with Ubuntu in mind. This will be the first big non-Dublin event of 2010. The Main Speakers will be Matt Zimmerman of Canonical Ltd. 

=== Speakers ===

* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~mdz |Matt Zimmerman]]</nowiki> of Canonical Ltd.
* <nowiki>[[czajkowski |Laura Czajkowski]]</nowiki> 
* Jimmy O'Regan speaking about Google Summer of Code
* Jeffrey Roe from Dublin Hackerspace - <nowiki>[[http://www.tog.ie/ |TOG]]</nowiki>
* David Coallier of <nowiki>[[http://echolibre.com | echolibre]]</nowiki>
* Paul O'Connor of <nowiki>[[http://www.ons.ie | ONS]]</nowiki>

It will take place in the Jonathan Swift(B1-023), in the Main building in 
<nowiki>[[http://www.openstreetmap.org/?lat=52.67335&lon=-8.57013&zoom=16&layers=B000FTF | <nowiki>[[File:21446.png]]</nowiki></nowiki>]] at 12pm

=== Timetable ===

* 12:00 - 12:40 '''"Talk 1"''' ''- Paul O'Connor''
* 12:40 - 13:20 '''"Google Summer of Code"''' ''- Jimmy O'Regan''
* 13:20 - 14:00 '''"So you want to build a Hackerspace"''' ''- Jeffrey Roe''
* 14:00 - 15:00 '''Break''' ''TBC''
* 15:00 - 15:40 '''"Ubuntu Inside Out"''' ''- Matt Zimmerman''
* 15:40 - 16:20 '''"To Ubuntu and Beyond - Where individual participation can take you"''' ''- Laura Czajkowski''
* 16:20 - 17:00 '''"An introduction to CouchDB"''' ''- David Coallier''

=== Directions ===

To get to the room: If you enter in the main entrance and go "Up the curved stair on the right, past the accomodation office, through double doors, left, up the stairs to the 1 level, through the double doors, turn right, then left, then right, then left and through 2 more sets of double doors"

Directions will of course be signed from the main entrance
